text: Attilio Fontana (born 28 March 1952) is an Italian politician. He is a member of Lega Nord. He has been the President of Lombardy since 2018. He was Mayor of Induno Olona from 1995 to 1999. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Varese
title: Attilio Fontana
